title: Spacious 2 bed, living and dining rms, 2 pkg in multi family
posting_body: ['Large 2 bed, eat in kitchen with dishwasher and', 'gas stove.', 'Formal dining room with China closet,', 'living room, 2 bedrooms and a full bath.', 'A cat is allowed sorry no dogs.', 'Tenant responsible', 'for utilities.', 'Hardwood floors, high ceilings and lots of sunlight.', 'Walk to Magoun and Davis Squares and 2 parking spaces', 'included.', 'Available for 9/1.', 'Good credit and monthly employment required.', 'Set up your viewing now.', 'There is a real estate fee of $2,850.', 'if you rent this unit.', 'Monaco R.E.', 'Newton, MA', '617-974-3019', 'Leave me your email address for photos.', 'Please reference: 2 bedroom  2 parking in your text or message Thank you']
